content:
A heroic skier captured the heart-pounding moment he dug a man out from under a pile of fresh snow after an avalanche in Switzerland — when he spotted a limb sticking out of the powder.

de: Ein rasanter Moment: Skifahrer rettet Mann, der unter Lawine verschüttet wurde – nachdem er Gliedmaßen entdeckt hat, die aus dem Schnee ragten. Matteo Zilla, 37, tagsüber Kreativdirektor und begeisterter Skifahrer, raste am Samstag die Schweizer Pisten hinunter, als ihm auffiel, dass ein Fuß herausragte.

title: 'Really strong winds across the board': weather alerts in place across Newfoundland
description: A windy weather system is expected to hit the island of Newfoundland Sunday night. While strong winds are expected across the entire island and south Labrador, significant snowfall in the west will create blizzard conditions.
content:
Strong winds are expected to sweep across the island of Newfoundland Sunday night, with the west coast getting hit with up to 40 cm of snow at the same time.
Really strong winds across the board wit… [+3528 chars]
de: „Wirklich starke Winde auf der ganzen Linie“: In ganz Neufundland gelten Wetterwarnungen. Es wird erwartet, dass am Sonntagabend ein windiges Wettersystem die Insel Neufundland heimsucht. Während auf der gesamten Insel und im Süden Labradors mit starken Winden zu rechnen ist, wird es im Westen durch starken Schneefall zu Schneestürmen kommen.
en: 'Really strong winds across the board': weather alerts in place across Newfoundland. A windy weather system is expected to hit the island of Newfoundland Sunday night. While strong winds are expected across the entire island and south Labrador, significant snowfall in the west will create blizzard conditions.
la: 'Ventes validi per tabulam': in summis tempestatibus in loco trans Terram Novam. Systema tempestatum ventosum expectatur ut insulam Novae Terrae Saturni nocte ferire praesumat. Dum venti validi per totam insulam et meridiem Labrador exspectantur, nix significantes in occidente condiciones blizzardas creabit.

title: Petty snow shoveler gets ice-cold revenge on neighbor who stole parking spot by pouring 10 gallons of water on his car windshield: 'I saw his car in the spot I had just shoveled'
description:
When the snow starts to pile up 8 inches high, it's time to shovel — too bad these neighbors can't agree on who should claim a shoveled parking space. 
How do we all feel about snow days in this modern age of ours? I know they used to be a major sore spot fo…
content:

How do we all feel about snow days in this moder… [+1713 chars]
de:
Kleiner Schneeschaufelr rächt sich eiskalt an einem Nachbarn, der einen Parkplatz gestohlen hat, indem er 10 Gallonen Wasser auf die Windschutzscheibe seines Autos schüttet: „Ich habe sein Auto an der Stelle gesehen, die ich gerade geschaufelt hatte.“ Wenn sich der Schnee 20 cm hoch anhäuft, ist es Zeit zu schaufeln – schade, dass sich diese Nachbarn nicht darauf einigen können, wer einen geschaufelten Parkplatz beanspruchen soll. 
Wie denken wir alle über Schneetage in unserem modernen Zeitalter? Ich weiß, dass sie früher ein großer wunder Punkt für … waren.

How do we all feel about snow days in this modern age of ours? I know they used to be a major sore spot fo…
la:

Cum nix incipit struere 8 pollices altae, tempus est ad rutrum — vicinis quoque malis consentire non potest quis in raedam spatium shoveled petere debet.

title: Kashmir sees season’s first snowfall, raising hopes for tourism, agriculture
description: The snowfall, however, disrupted air and surface traffic, causing inconvenience to travellers, with flight operations at Srinagar airport being affected intermittently and several roads turning slippery
content: The plains of the Kashmir Valley received the seasons first snowfall on Friday, while high-altitude areas witnessed a fresh spell, transforming the region into a winter landscape and rekindling hopes… [+2283 chars]
de: Kaschmir sieht den ersten Schneefall der Saison und weckt Hoffnungen für Tourismus und Landwirtschaft. Der Schneefall störte jedoch den Flug- und Landverkehr, was zu Unannehmlichkeiten für Reisende führte, da der Flugbetrieb am Flughafen Srinagar zeitweise beeinträchtigt wurde und mehrere Straßen rutschig wurden
en: Kashmir sees season’s first snowfall, raising hopes for tourism, agriculture. The snowfall, however, disrupted air and surface traffic, causing inconvenience to travellers, with flight operations at Srinagar airport being affected intermittently and several roads turning slippery
la: Kashmir temporis nix primum videt, spem peregrinationis, agriculturae. Nives autem aeris et mercaturae superficiei disruptae, viatoribus incommoditatem moventes, cum operationes fugae in aeroportus Srinagar continuo affectae sunt et variae viae lubricae conversiones.

title: Drivers in Germany face hazardous conditions as winter weather bites
description: Germany continues to be afflicted by black ice, heavy frost, snow and strong winds, which have led to a number of fatal traffic accidents on motorways.
content:
Germany continues to be afflicted by black ice, heavy frost, snow and strong winds, which have led to a number of fatal traffic accidents on motorways.
 Freezing rain, black ice and persistent frost… [+3185 chars]
de: Autofahrer in Deutschland müssen sich bei kaltem Winterwetter gefährlichen Bedingungen stellen. Deutschland wird weiterhin von Glatteis, starkem Frost, Schnee und starkem Wind heimgesucht, was zu zahlreichen tödlichen Verkehrsunfällen auf Autobahnen geführt hat.
en: Drivers in Germany face hazardous conditions as winter weather bites. Germany continues to be afflicted by black ice, heavy frost, snow and strong winds, which have led to a number of fatal traffic accidents on motorways.
la: Coegi in Germania condiciones infestas faciei quam tempestas hiemis mordet. Germania glacie nigra, gelu gravi, nivis et ventis validis affligitur, quae aliquot casus in motorviae fatales mercaturae effecerunt.
